title: Easy2Boot not working on one system

forumNotes.author: blackwind
forumNotes.content: On one of my systems, Easy2Boot boots, but dumps me at a "grub\>" prompt. On all my other systems, it works as expected. What gives?

forumNotes.author: saddlejib
forumNotes.content: Is the other system your Television or Stereo System ?????

forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
Try adding to top of \\menu.lst

find

pause HERE I AM

What do you see?
